enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: I2S is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: I2S is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit section disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit section enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Receive section disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive section enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Network mode not selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Network mode selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Asynchronous mode selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Synchronous mode selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: I2S master mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: I2S slave mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Network clock not output on SRCK port

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Network clock output on SRCK port

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Two-channel mode disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Two-channel mode enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Clock idle state is '0'

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clock idle state is '1'

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Continue frame-sync/clock generation after current frame during which CR[TE] is cleared. This may be required when frame-sync and clocks are required from I2S, even when no data is to be received

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Stop frame-sync/clock generation at next frame boundary. This will be effective also in case where transmitter is already disabled in current or previous frames

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Continue frame-sync/clock generation after current frame during which CR[RE] is cleared. This may be required when Frame-sync and Clocks are required from I2S, even when no data is to be received

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Stop frame-sync/clock generation at next frame boundary. This will be effective also in case where receiver is already disabled in current or previous frames

field.name: SYNCTXFS
field.description: SYNCTXFS bit provides a safe window for CR[TE] to be visible to the internal circuit which is just after FS occurrence. When SYNCTXFS is set, CR[TE] gets latched on FS occurrence and latched CR[TE] is used to enable/disable I2S transmitter. CR[TE] needs setup of 2 bit-clock cycles before occurrence of FS. If CR[TE] is changed within 2 bit-clock cycles of FS occurrence, there is high probability that CR[TE] will be latched on next FS. With TFRCLKDIS feature on, CR[TE] is used directly to enable transmitter in following cases (i) Sync mode and Rx disabled (ii) Async Mode. Latched-TE is used to disable the transmitter. This bit has no relevance in gated mode and AC97 mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CR[TE] not latched with FS occurrence and used directly for transmitter enable/disable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CR[TE] latched with FS occurrence and latched-TE used for transmitter enable/disable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO0 has data for transmission

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO0 is empty

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO1 has data for transmission

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO1 is empty

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Space available in receive FIFO0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO0 is full

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Space available in receive FIFO1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO1 is full

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Current time slot is not last time slot of frame

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Current time slot is the last receive time slot of frame

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Current time slot is not last time slot of frame

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Current time slot is the last transmit time slot of frame

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No occurrence of receive frame sync

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive frame sync occurred during reception of next word in RX

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No occurrence of transmit frame sync

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit frame sync occurred during transmission of last word written to TX

enumeratedValue.description: No underrun detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 1 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 14 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0010
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 2 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 13 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 3 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 12 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 4 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 11 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 5 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 10 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0110
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 6 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 9 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 7 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 8 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 8 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 7 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 9 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 6 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1010
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 10 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 5 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1011
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 11 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 4 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1100
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 12 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 3 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1101
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 13 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 2 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1110
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 14 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 1 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 15 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 0 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when at least one data word have been written to the Receive FIFO Set when RxFIFO = 1,2.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0010
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 2 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 2,3.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 3 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 3,4.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 4 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 4,5.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 5 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 5,6.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0110
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 6 data word have been written to the Receive. Set when RxFIFO = 6,7......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 7 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 7,8......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 8 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 8,9......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 9 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 9,10.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1010
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 10 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 10,11.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1011
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 11 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 11,12.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1100
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 12 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 12,13.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1101
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 13 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 13,14,15data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1110
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 14 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 14,15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1111
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when 15 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO (default). Set when RxFIFO = 15 data words

enumeratedValue.description: 0 data word in receive FIFO

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 1 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 14 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0010
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 2 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 13 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 3 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 12 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 4 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 11 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 5 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 10 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0110
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 6 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 9 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 7 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 8 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 8 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 7 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 9 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 6 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1010
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 10 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 5 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1011
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 11 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 4 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1100
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 12 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 3 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1101
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 13 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 2 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1110
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 14 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 1 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: TFE set when there are more than or equal to 15 empty slots in Transmit FIFO. (default) Transmit FIFO empty is set when TxFIFO <= 0 data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when at least one data word have been written to the Receive FIFO Set when RxFIFO = 1,2.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0010
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 2 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 2,3.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 3 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 3,4.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 4 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 4,5.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 5 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 5,6.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0110
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 6 data word have been written to the Receive. Set when RxFIFO = 6,7......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 7 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 7,8......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1000
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 8 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 8,9......15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 9 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 9,10.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1010
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 10 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 10,11.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1011
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 11 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 11,12.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1100
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 12 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 12,13.....15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1101
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 13 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 13,14,15data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1110
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when more than or equal to 14 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO. Set when RxFIFO = 14,15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1111
enumeratedValue.description: RFF set when 15 data word have been written to the Receive FIFO (default). Set when RxFIFO = 15 data words

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AC97 mode disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: I2S in AC97 mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AC97 Fixed Mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AC97 Variable Mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tag info stored in ATAG register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tag info stored in ATAG register and Rx FIFO 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Next frame will not have a Read Command

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Next frame will have a Read Command

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Next frame will not have a Write Command

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Next frame will have a Write Command

register.name: TMSK
register.description: I2S Transmit Time Slot Mask Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Valid Time Slot

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Time Slot masked (no data transmitted in this time slot)

register.name: RMSK
register.description: I2S Receive Time Slot Mask Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Valid Time Slot

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Time Slot masked (no data received in this time slot)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Data channel disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Data channel enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write has no effect

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write enables the corresponding data channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write has no effect

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write disables the corresponding data channel
